bike.description: S-Works Shiv FACT IS 11r carbon, FACT IS construction, crosswind-optimized airfoils, 1-1/8" lower bearing, OSBB, Control Tower Fit System, Fuelselage Integrated Hydration System

components.description: Specialized FACT Aero carbon monocoque, carbon steerer and crown for 1-1/8" bearing
1-1/8" upper and lower, hybrid cartridge bearings
Magura RT8TT caliper hydraulic brakes including adaptors and brake pads
Integrated hydration, frame-mounted Fuelcell compatible, Chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owner's manual
